title.rendered: All-new quarried stone profiles incorporate natural splendor

content.rendered:
Eldorado Natural Stone provides architects with larger selection

SAN DIEGO, CA – Eldorado Stone, the leading manufacturer of stone veneer, has been inspired by natural stone for 45 years. The result of that experience, and their passion for stone, is a new line of natural stone veneer—Eldorado Natural Stone. Any design that incorporates natural stone offers raw and natural allure, and with the new Eldorado Natural Stone, architects can now select from more top-tier, quality choices.

“Curated from select quarries across the United States, our stones have been hand cut by artisans to reflect the timeless characteristics of Mother Nature,” said Ramsay Hawfield, Vice President of Marketing and Product Development at Eldorado Stone. “Nature’s beauty flows through the textures, colors and veins of each stone and creates compelling environments for any application.”

TWEET THIS: New @EldoradoStone Natural Stone collection incorporates quarried stone into any architectural #design application. http://ctt.ec/01aff

New stone profiles include: 246Ledge, featuring saw-cut tops and bottoms with natural vertical edges; ChiselCut, adding a rustic ashlar pattern to an installation; CutLedge, showcasing uniformity and intriguing surface textures in modern applications; and Ledgestone, a versatile linear ledge that works well in numerous architectural styles.

Eldorado Natural Stone is cut into pieces roughly 1-inch thick, allowing for easy installation. With inspirations from vast mountains to sun-drenched wheat fields, these rugged-yet-refined stone profiles allow inviting and contemporary color combinations, creating masterpieces in any space.

For more information about Eldorado Natural Stone, please visit www.eldoradonatural.com.  For more information about Eldorado Stone, please visit eldoradostone.com.

 

# # #

 

 

About Eldorado Stone

Eldorado Stone, LLC is headquartered in San Marcos, Calif. It is a subsidiary of Headwaters Incorporated (NYSE:HW), a world leader in creating value through innovative advancements in the utilization of natural resources. Eldorado Stone offers a full line of interior and exterior products that elevate architecture and design, including stone and brick veneer, fireplace surrounds, fire bowls and a full Eldorado Outdoor collection. The company currently operates manufacturing facilities in several states with regional distribution centers across the U.S. For more information and to view a gallery of beautiful installations, visit www.eldoradostone.com or call 1‑800-925-1491 for a free catalog.
